entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3.
